Package algorithm

Class GeneticAlgorithm

java.lang.Object
algorithm.GeneticAlgorithm
All Implemented Interfaces:
Algorithm
public class GeneticAlgorithm extends Object implements Algorithm
This class represents a genetic algorithm for optimizing a population of individuals.

    • GeneticAlgorithm

      public GeneticAlgorithm(int numberOfInitialPopulation, SpacePatrols sp, Integer maximumPopulationSize, PendingEventContainer<SimulationEvent> pendingEventContainer)
      Constructs a GeneticAlgorithm with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      numberOfInitialPopulation - the initial number of individuals in the population.
      sp - the space patrols problem instance.
      maximumPopulationSize - the maximum population size.
      pendingEventContainer - the container for pending simulation events.
